title: Developer / Mentor
highlights: Mentored students through software development journey
Continuously contribute through talks and insights
description: While also learning to code and attending Devmountain, I provided mentorship, support, and ongoing contributions to aspiring developers at Devmountain through pair programming, talks, and insights.

title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed mental health, substance abuse, and parenting support apps.
Promoted to mid-level engineer within first year.
Led frontend development of admin panel.
description: I was hired as a junior developer but was soon promoted to mid-level full-stack engineer, leading the development of mobile and web applications aimed at improving mental health, addressing substance abuse, and fostering parenting skills, notably leading the frontend design of a robust admin panel.

title: Frontend Engineer
highlights: Led development as lead frontend engineer at National Processing
Developed a new web app and UI library
Expanded expertise to include full-stack responsibilities for seamless user experience
description: At National Processing, I took on the lead frontend engineer role, overseeing the development of a new web application and UI library, while also expanding my skills to cover full-stack responsibilities for a cohesive user experience and strong functionality.

title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Develop and maintain frontend and backend of Paymentbox
Collaborate with product and design teams for feature implementation and UX enhancement
Contribute to application architecture and performance
description: At Paymentbox we are developing new tech for the payment processing world. We are solving unique problems and coming up with inovative solutions. I also work closely with the product and design teams to implement new features and improve the user experience. While also maintaining current applciations, I help contribute to the overall architecture and performance of new projects.
